com.camerontec.util.data

Class NativeTypeByteUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.data.NativeTypeByteUtils

  • public final class NativeTypeByteUtils
extends Object
    Utility methods for serializing and deserializing natives types.

    These utilities are considered low level and therefore are all unchecked. That is, all methods assume that byte[] parameters are both non null and of an appropriate length. It is the caller's responsibility to make sure these conditions are always met.

      • putBigEndianChar

        public static int putBigEndianChar(Buffer buffer,
                                   int index,
                                   char value)
        Set a big endian char value in a Buffer at the specified index.

        This method is intended to be used as a helper when writing Buffer implementations on top of data structures which do not explicitly support put char, or don't guarantee to support it in compatible way.

        Parameters:
        buffer - The target byte buffer.
        index - The index.
        value - The char value.
        Returns:
        The number of bytes written.

        index - The index.
